chapter.text: 21|1|Dui zhongren de qingsuan yijing linjinle, tamen que zai shuhu zhi zhong, bu jiayi siwei.
21|2|Mei feng you xin de jinian, cong tamen de zhu jianglin tamen, tamen qingting ta, bing jiayi chaoxiao.
21|3|Tamen shi xinbuzaiyan de. Bu yi zhe mimi tanlun shuo:“Zhe zhishi yige xiang nimen yiyang de fanren, nimen mingzhi shi moshu er shuncong ta ma?”
21|4|Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu zhidao zai tianshang he dishang suo shuo dehua, ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quanzhi de.”
21|5|Dan tamen shuo: Zhe shi chirenshuomeng ne? Haishi ta niezao huangyan ne? Haishi ta shi yige shiren ne? Jiao ta xiang gudai de zhong shizhe nayang zhaoshi women yi zhong jixiang ba.
21|6|Zai tamen zhiqian, wo suo huimie de chengshi, meiyou yige ceng xin jixiang de. Xianzai, tamen hui xin jixiang ma?
21|7|Zai ni zhiqian, wo zhi paiqianle ceng feng qishi de xuduo nanren; ruguo nimen bu zhidao, jiu yingdang xunwen jingtong jinian zhe.
21|8|Wo meiyou ba tamen zaocheng bu chifan de roushen, tamen ye bushi changsheng bulao de.
21|9|Sihou, wo dui tamen shijian nuo yue, gu zhengjiu tamen he wo suo yiyu zhe, er huimieleguo fen zhe.
21|10|Wo que yi jiang shi nimen yi ben jingdian, qizhong you nimen de jinian, nandao nimen bu liaojie ma?
21|11|Wo ceng huimiele xuduo bu yi de xiangcun, suihou, wo ceng chuangzaole bie de minzhong.
21|12|Dang tamen ganjue wo de yanxing de shihou, tamen huran benpao.
21|13|“Nimen buyao benpao, nimen huiqu xiangshou nimen de haohua shenghuo, he nimen de zhuzhai, yibian nimen jianglai shou shenxun.”
21|14|Tamen shuo:“Ai zai women! Women yuanlai que shi bu yi de ren.”
21|15|Na ju hua, jiangyao chang wei tamen de aihao, zhidao wo shi tamen bian cheng gu cha he sihui.
21|16|Wo weiceng yi youxi de taidu chuangzao tiandi wanwu;
21|17|jiaruo wo yao xiaoqian, wo biding yi wo zheli de dongxi zuo xiaoqian, wo bushi ai xiaoqian de.
21|18|Wo yi zhenli touzhi miu wang, er jipo qi naodai, miu wang shunshi xiaowang. Bei zai nimen! Youyu nimen dui an la wang jia miaoshu.
21|19|Fan zai tiandi jian de, dou shi ta de; fan zai ta nali de, dou qiancheng de chongbai ta, ji bu aoman, you bu pijuan.
21|20|Tamen zhouye zan ta chaojue, hao bu songxie.
21|21|Nandao tamen ba dadishang de xuduo dongxi dang shenming, er naxie shenming neng shi siren fuhuo ma?
21|22|Chu an la wai, jiaruo tiandi jian hai you xuduo shenming, name, tiandi biding pohuaile. Zansong an la——baozuo de zhu——shi chao hu tamen de miaoshu de.
21|23|Ta ziji de xingwei, bu shou shenxun, er tamen dou shi yao shou shenxun de.

21|24|Nandao tamen chu an la wai hai shi feng xuduo shenming ma? Ni shuo:“Nimen na zhengju lai ba, zhe shi duiyu wo de tongdao zhe de jinian, yeshi duiyu zai wo zhiqian zhe de jinian, dan tamen daban buzhi zhenli, beiqi ta.”
21|25|Zai ni zhiqian, wo suo paiqian de shizhe, dou feng dao wo de qishi: Chu wo zhi wai jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Suoyi nimen yingdang chongbai wo.
21|26|Tamen shuo:“Zhiren zhu yi (tianshi) wei nu'er.” Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu. Buran, tamen shi shou youdai de nupu,
21|27|tamen zai ta nali bu gan xian kaikou, tamen zhi fengxing ta de mingling;
21|28|ta zhidao zai tamen qianmian de he houmian de; tamen zhi ti tasuo xiyue zhe shuo qing. Tamen yin jingwei ta er kongju.
21|29|Tamen zhong shei shuo:“Wo shi an la yiwai de shenming,” wo jiu yi huo yu baochou shei, wo jiangyao zheyang baochou yiqie bu yi zhe.
21|30|Buxindao zhe nandao bu zhidao ma? Tiandi yuan shi bise de, er wo kaitianpidi, wo yongshui chuangzao yiqie shengwu. Nandao tamen buxin ma?
21|31|Wo zai da dishang chuangzaole qun shan, yimian da di dongdang er tamen bu'an; wo zai qun shan jian chuangzao xuduo kuankuo de daolu, yibian tamen neng dadao mudi.
21|32|Wo ba tian zaocheng anquan de qionglong, er tamen hushi qizhong de jixiang.
21|33|Ta shi chuangzao zhouye he ri yue de, tianti yun hang ge xun yitiao guidao.
21|34|Zai ni zhiqian de renhe ren, wo meiyou wei ta zhuding changsheng, ruguo ni sile, nandao tamen nenggou changsheng ma?
21|35|Fan you xueqi zhe, dou yao chang si de ziwei. Wo yi huo fu kaoyan nimen, nimen zhi bei zhao gui wo.
21|36|Dang bu xindao zhe kanjian ni de shihou, tamen zhi ba ni dang zuo xiaobing.(Tamen shuo):“Jiushi zhege ren feibang nimen de shenming ma?” Tamen bu xin zhiren zhu de jinian.
21|37|Ren shi shenglai jizao de, wo jiangyao zhaoshi nimen wo de jixiang, suoyi nimen bubi cuicu wo.
21|38|Tamen shuo:“Zhege jinggao jiang zai he shi shixian ne? Ruguo nimen shi chengshi de ren.”
21|39|Jiaruo bu xindao zhe, zhidao zai nage shihou, tamen buneng dui ziji de mianbu he beibu fangyu huoyan, tamen ye buneng huode yuanzhu……
21|40|dan fuhuo shi jiang turan lailin, er shi tamen jinghuang shicuo, tamen buneng dikang ta, ye bu meng zhan huan.
21|41|Zai ni zhiqian, you xuduo shizhe, que yi bei ren yunong, er yunong de xingfa yi jianglin yunong zhele.
21|42|Ni shuo:“Shei zai zhouye zhong baohu nimen, shi nimen de mian yu zhiren zhu (de xingfa) ne?” Buran, tamen beiqi tamen de zhu de jinian.
21|43|Chu wo zhi wai, nandao tamen you xuduo shenming baohu tamen ma? Tamen suo chongbai de shenming, buneng ziwei, tamen dui wo (de xingfa) ye bu meng bihu.

21|44|Buran, wo shi zhe deng ren he tamen de zuxian de xiangshou anle, zhidao tamen de shouming yanchang. Nandao tamen bu zhidao wo lai suoxiao tamen de bianjing ma? Nandao tamen shi zhansheng zhe ma?
21|45|Ni shuo:“Wo zhi jie qishi er jinggao nimen.” Dang longzi bei jinggao de shihou, tamen ting bujian zhaohuan.
21|46|Ruguo ni de zhu de xingfa, youyi sihao jiechu tamen, tamen biding shuo:“Bei zai women! Women yuanlai que shi bu yi zhe.”
21|47|Zai fuhuo ri, wo jiang shezhi gongdao de tiancheng, renhe ren dou bu shou yidian er yuanwang; ta de xingwei sui wei ru jiezi, wo ye yao baochou ta; wo zu wei qingsuan zhe.
21|48|Wo que yi shangci mu sa he ha lun zhengju he guangming, yiji jingwei zhe de jinian;
21|49|jingwei zhe zai mimi zhong jingwei tamen de zhu, tamen shi wei fuhuo shi'er kongju de.
21|50|Zhe shi wo suo jiang shi de jixiang de jinian, nandao nimen fouren ta ma?
21|51|Yiqian wo que yi ba zhengzhi shangci yi bo la xin, wo yuan shi shen zhi ta de.
21|52|Dangshi, ta dui ta de fuqin he zongzu shuo:“Nimen suo yilian de zhexie diaoxiang shi shenme dongxi?”
21|53|Tamen shuo:“Women faxian women de zuxian shi chongbai tamen de.”
21|54|Ta shuo:“Nimen he nimen de zuxian, que yi xianyu mingxian de mi wu zhi zhong.”
21|55|Tamen shuo: Ni shi dui women shuo zhengjing hua ne? Haishi he women kaiwanxiao ne?
21|56|Ta shuo:“Buran, nimen de zhu, shi tiandi de zhu, shi tiandi de chuangzao zhe, wo duiyu ci shi shi yige zhengren.
21|57|Zhi an la fashi, nimen zhuanshen likai zhihou, wo bi shefa hui diao nimen de ouxiang.”
21|58|Ta ba ouxiang da suile, zhi liu xia yige zuida de, yibian tamen zhuan huilai wen ta.
21|59|Tamen shuo:“Shei dui women de shenling zuole zhe jian shi ne? Ta que shi bu yi de ren.”
21|60|Tamen shuo: Women ceng tingjian yige qingnian, ming jiao yi bo la xin de, feibang tamen.
21|61|Tamen shuo:“Nimen ba ta na dao zhongren mianqian, yibian tamen zuozheng.”
21|62|Tamen shuo: Yi bo la xin a! Ni dui women de shenling zuole zhe jian shi ma?
21|63|Ta shuo:“Buran, shi zhege zuida de ouxiang zuole zhe jian shi. Ruguo tamen hui shuohua, nimen jiu wen wen tamen ba.”
21|64|Tamen jiu huxiang piping. Suihou shuo:“Nimen (chongbai ouxiang) que shi bu yi de.”
21|65|Ranhou, tamen daoxingnishi,(tamen shuo):“Ni que yi zhidao zhexie shi bu hui shuohua de.”
21|66|Ta shuo: Nimen she an la er chongbai naxie dui nimen hao wu huo fu de dongxi ma?
21|67|Pei, nimen bu chongbai an la, que chongbai zhexie dongxi, nandao nimen bu lijie ma?”
21|68|Tamen shuo:“Nimen shao si ta ba! Nimen yuanzhu nimen de shenling ba! Ruguo nimen you suo zuowei.”
21|69|Wo shuo:“Huo a! Ni dui yi bo la xin bian cheng liangshuang de heping de ba!”
21|70|Tamen xiang mouhai ta, dan wo shi tamen bian cheng zui kuisun de.
21|71|Wo zhengjiu ta he lu te, er shi ta lia qianyi dao wo wei shiren er jiang fu di difang qu.
21|72|Wo shangci ta yi si ha ge, you zeng ci ta ye er gu bai, wo shi tamen dou bian cheng shanren.
21|73|Wo yi tamen wei shiren de shibiao, tamen feng wo de mingling er yindao zhongren. Wo qishi tamen: Yingdang lixingshanshi, jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke. Tamen shi zhi chongbai wo de.
21|74|Wo shangci lu te zhihui he xueshi, wo zhengjiu ta tuoli you hui xing de chengshi, nage chengshi de jumin que shi fangdang de e min.
21|75|Wo shi ta jinru wo de enhui zhi zhong, ta que shi yige shanren.
21|76|(Ni yingdang xushu) nu ha, yiqian, ta ceng huyu wo, guwo dayingle ta, bingqie zhengjiu ta he ta de xintumen tuoli youhuan.
21|77|Wo shi ta tuoli fouren wo de jixiang de minzhong, tamen que shi e min, guwo shi tamen tongtong bei yan si.
21|78|(Ni yingdang xushu) da wu de he su lai man, dang baixing de yang qun yejian chulai chi zhuangjia de shihou, ta lia wei zhuangjia er panjue, duiyu tamen de panjue wo shi jianzheng.
21|79|Wo shi su lai man zhidao zenyang panjue. Mei yige wo du shangcile zhihui he xueshi. Wo shi qun shan he zhong niao suicong da wu de yidao zansong wo. Wo cengjing zuoguo na jian shile.
21|80|Wo jiao ta ti nimen zhizao kaijia, yi baohu nimen, shi nimen de mian yu zhanzheng de chuangshang, zhe nimen ganxie ma?
21|81|Wo ti su lai man zhifu kuangfeng, ta feng ta de mingling er chui dao wo ceng jiang fu di difang, wo shi shen zhi wanwu de.
21|82|Wo you ti ta zhifu yibufen emo, tamen ti ta qianshui, bingqie zuo qita gongzuo, wo shi jiandu tamen de.
21|83|(Ni yingdang xushu) ai you bo, dangshi ta ceng huyu ta de zhu, shuo:“Guji que yi shanghai wo, ni shi zui renci de.”
21|84|Wo jiu daying ta de qingqiu, er jiechu tasuo huan de guji, bing yi ta de jiashu he tongyang de ren shangci ta, zhe shi youyu cong wo fachu de enhui he duiyu chongbai wo zhe de jinian.
21|85|(Ni yingdang xushu) yi sima yi, yi de li si, zhu lei ji fu lei dou shi jianren de.
21|86|Wo shi tamen jinru wo de enhui zhi zhong, tamen que shi shanren.

21|87|(Ni yingdang xushu) zuo nong, dangshi ta ceng fenfen bu pingdi li qu, ta caixiang wo jue bu yueshu ta, ta zai chongchong hei'an zhong huyu (shuo):“Chu ni zhi wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai zhe, wo zansong ni chaojue wanwu, wo que shi bu yi de.”
21|88|Wo jiu daying ta, er zhengjiu ta tuoli youhuan; wo zheyang zhengjiu xindao zhe tuoli youhuan.
21|89|(Ni yingdang xushu) zai kai li ya, dangshi ta ceng huyu ta de zhu (shuo):“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao ren sui wo gudu, ni shi zui hao de jicheng zhe.”
21|90|Wo jiu daying ta, erqie shangci ta ye ha ya, bing gaizheng ta de qizi. Tamen zhengxian xingshan, tamen yin xiwang he kongju er huyu wo, tamen duiyu wo shi gongshun de.
21|91|(Ni yingdang xushu) na baochi zhencao de nuzi, wo ba wo de jingshen chui ru ta de tinei, wo ceng yi ta he ta de erzi wei shiren de yi zhong jixiang.
21|92|Nimen de zhege minzu, que shi yige tongyi de minzu, wo shi nimen de zhu, gu nimen yingdang chongbai wo.
21|93|Tamen fen cheng liao ruogan jiaopai, ge pai dou yao guiyu wo.
21|94|Shei xindao erqie xing shan, shei de laoji jue bu zao fouren, wo que shi jilu ta de shangong de.
21|95|Wo suo huimie de shi zhen, xiang fu fan renshi, na shi bu keneng de.
21|96|Zhidao ya zhu zhe he ma zhu zhe bei kaishi, er cong ge gaodi liu xiang sifang.
21|97|Zhenshi de yingxu jiangjinle, bu xindao zhe turan deng zhuo yanjing (shuo):“Bei zai women! Women duiyu jintian ceng shi shuhu de. Buran, women shi bu yi de.”
21|98|Nimen he nimen she an la er chongbai de, que shi huo yu de ranliao, nimen jiang jinru huo yu.
21|99|Jiaruo zhexie shi shenling, tamen bu jinru huo yule. Tamen dou jiang yong ju qizhong.
21|100|Tamen zai qizhong jiang jingchang tanxi, tamen zai qizhong jiang yi wu suo wen.
21|101|Ceng meng wo zui you de daiyu zhe, jiang yuanli huo yu,
21|102|er bu wen qi zui wei de shengyin, tamen jiang yong ju zai ziji suo aihao de xiangle zhong,
21|103|bu shi tamen youchou zuida de kongbu. Zhong tianshi jiang huanying tamen (shuo):“Zhe shi nimen ceng shou yingxu de rizi.”
21|104|Zai na ri, wo jiang tian juan qi youru juanzhou jiang shuhua juan qi yiyang. Qichu wo zenyang chuangzao wanwu, wo jiu zenyang shi wanwu huanyuan. Zhe shi wo ziyuan yingxu de, wo bi shixing ta.
21|105|Zai jinian de jingdian yihou, wo que yi zai “zai fu er” zhong xie dao: Dadi bi wei wo de shan pu suo jicheng.
21|106|Duiyu chongbai zhu de minzhong, ci jing zhong que you chongzu de biyi.
21|107|Wo paiqian ni, zhi wei lianmin zhong shijie.
21|108|Ni shuo:“Wo zhi feng dao qishi shuo: Nimen suo dang chongbai de, zhishi du yi de zhuzai. Nimen guishun ma?”
21|109|Ruguo tamen beili zhengdao, ni jiu shuo:“Wo gongping di tongzhi nimen, wo bu zhidao nimen suo bei jinggao (de xingfa) shi linjin de ne? Haishi yaoyuan de ne?
21|110|Ta dique zhidao gongkai de yanyu, ye zhidao nimen suo yinhui de.
21|111|Wo bu zhidao, zhe huoxu shi dui nimen de kaoyan he zhanshi de xiangshou.”
21|112|Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni binggong panjue. Women de zhu shi zhiren de zhu, duiyu nimen suoyong yi miaoshu ta de yanyu ta shi bei qiuzhu de.”
